204b3(mdo sde): kyi mdog ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ lus bsod nams brgya stong gis ni brgyan/ dpal gyis ni rab tu 'bar gzi brjid kyis ni shin tu lhang nger gyur/ lus ni mtshan rnams kyis rnam par
204b4(mdo sde): smras/ lus sred med kyi bu'i lus ltar 'khregs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/ nam pa' la tal bdun tsam nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su
204b5(mdo sde): bskor cing mdun du bdang nas 'ongs te/ de 'jig rten gyikhams mi mjed 'di gal ba dang / bya rgod daphung po'i/ gal ba der 'ongs te/ phyin nas khang pa brtsegs bdenas
204b6(mdo sde): babs te brgya stong ri ba'i mu tig gi 'dreng ba thogs shing / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba
204b7(mdo sde): byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ mu tig gi phreng ba phul lo// phul nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhi/ 
204b8(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med pa skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga banyungs/ 
205a1(mdo sde): skyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar gnas sam/ zhes snyun gsol lo// bcom ldan 'das de 'di skad ces kyang gsungs te/ bcom ldan 'das khyod bzod dam
205a2(mdo sde): gzhes sam/ khams rnams 'thun nam/ khyod kyi sems can rnams go sla'am/ gdul sla 'am/ gso sla'am/ gtsang ma 'dod dam/ ha cang 'dod chags mi spyod dam/ ha cang zhe sdang
205a3(mdo sde): mi spyod dam/ ha cang gti mug mi spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi sems can dag shin tu phra dog can ma yin nam/ ser sna can ma yin nam/ mar mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ phar mi
205a4(mdo sde): 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ dge slong du mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ bram zer mi 'dzin pa ma yin nam/ log par lta ba dam yin nam/ sems ma dul ba yin nam/ dbang po ma
205a5(mdo sde): bsrungs pa ma yin nam/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi sems can de dag gi bdud phyir rgol ba bcom mam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
205a6(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang de rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gyi nang du bzhugs pa chos gsan pa'i phyir/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du gshegs sam/ bcom
205a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang la yang bcom ldan 'das de'i 'dri ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa rin chen mang de bzod dam/ 
205a8(mdo sde): gzhes sam/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mang ring du gnas sam zhes gsung ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
205b1(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i ring bsrel gyi sku blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang
205b2(mdo sde): de'i ring srel gyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ 
205b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rin chen mang la 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
205b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di ba com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las
205b5(mdo sde): 'das pa rin chen mang mthong bar 'tshal nas mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gis/ 
205b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu khyod nga dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
205b7(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa mthong bar 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa blta
205b8(mdo sde): ba'i phyir 'ongs pa legs so legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
206a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi drung du sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig bskrun/ de nas
206a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad+ma'i dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ 
206a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu n+dan byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa mthong na dga' ba la 'jig rten gyi khams gzungs thams cad shin tu ston par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
206a4(mdo sde): rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa / bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha'o sgyur ba da blan med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas
206a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
206a6(mdo sde): sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyi sil snyan brgya stong rab tu blangs te/ lo khri nyis stong du mchod pa byas so// rin po che sna dun
206a7(mdo sde): gyi snod brgyad khri bzhi stong phul lo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dang rnga sgra rgyal po'i gsung rab de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs
206a8(mdo sde): kyis de lta bu'i dad pa thob bo// de'i tshe de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra'i rgyal po la mchod pa byas shing sdod
206b1(mdo sde): brgyad khri ba ni stong de dag phul bde gnan zhig yin snyan du khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam/ becom za bar gyur na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci 'byor zhe na/ rigs kyi bugang
206b2(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin dang rnga sgra'i rgyal po de la mchod pa byas pa dang / snod de dag kyang phul ba de ni/ byang chub sems
206b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di nyid yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs de ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa
206b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ yongs dasu sbyang ba byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'dis/ sngon yang sangs rgyas
206b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed mthong ngo // pad ma'i dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' semasadapa' chen po sang sang ba'i dbyangs 'di mthong ngam/ pad+ma / 
206b6(mdo sde): dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ pad+ma'i dpal byang chub
206b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'di ni gzungs mang pos dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston te/ 'di lta ste/ la lar ni tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis
206b8(mdo sde): la lar ni brgya byin gyi gzugs kyi/ la lar ni dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis/ la lAni dmag dben gyi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni mchog
207a1(mdo sde): ga gzugs kyis/ la la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs kyis la lar ni khams kyi rgyal po'i gzugs kyis/ la la ni tshong dpon gyi gzugs kyis/ la la na khyim
207a2(mdo sde): bdag gi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni grong ma'i gzugs kyis/ la lar ni bram ze'i gzugs kyis dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston te/ la lar ni dge slong gi
207a3(mdo sde): gzugs kyis la lar ni dge slong ma'i gzugs kyis la lar ni dge bsnyen gyi gzugs kyis/ la lar ni dge bsnyen ma'i gzugs kyi/ la lar ni tshong dpon gyi chung ma'i gzugs kyis/ la
207a4(mdo sde): lang ni khyim bdag gi chung ma'i gzugs kyis la lar ni grong dmi'i chung ma'i gzugs kyis la lar ni khye'u gzu dgas kyis/ la lar ni bu mo'i gzugs kyis byang chub
207a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dam rje/ chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston te/ rigs kyi bu gzugs 'di snyed kun tu snyan
207a6(mdo sde): pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to// kha cig la ni gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi bar
207a7(mdo sde): gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs kyis dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to// kha cig la ni lha ma yin gyi
207a8(mdo sde): gzugs kyis/ kha cig la ni nam mkha' lding gi gzugs kyis kha cig la ni mi 'am ci'i gzugs kyis kha cig la ni lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
207b1(mdo sde): chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston to// sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mi khom par skye
207b2(mdo sde): ba'i bar gyi sems can rnams la yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs slob par 'gyur ro// btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams la yang byang
207b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs bud med kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul te/ dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir sems
207b4(mdo sde): can rnams la ston to// pad+ma'i dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang ba'i dbyangs ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du skyes pa'i sems can rnams
207b5(mdo sde): kyi skyob pa ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'din byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang bdabyangs 'di de snyed kyi gzugs su sprul pa/ dam pa'i chos
207b6(mdo sde): pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can rnams la ston te/ skyes bu dam pa 'di'i rdzu 'phrul yang nyams pa med/ shes rab kyang nyams pa med do// rigs kyi bu byang chub
207b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs ni ye shes kyi snang ba 'di nyid kyis// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na snang ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag gang ga'i
207b8(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la 'di byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis chos ston te/ nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams
208a1(mdo sde): la nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs
208a2(mdo sde): pa'i gzugs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyis chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bsrel gyi bar gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la// de bzhin
208a3(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i ring bsrel ston to// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar gyis/ 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la/ bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ston to// bad ma'i
208a4(mdo sde): dpal de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs/ dpa'i dbyangs ni ye shes kyi stobs bskyed pa thob pa'o// da de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
208a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' na po sang sang po'i dbyangs dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa 'di bcom ldan
208a6(mdo sde): 'das ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang ba'i dbyangs kyis sems can 'di snyed btul ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang lags/ de skad ces gsol to// 
208a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkra thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'adz+ra dang lal 'dzig ces bka' stsal
208a8(mdo sde): / rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po sangs pa'od dbyangs kyis 'di ltar sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byas pani/ gzugs
208b1(mdo sde): thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di yin no// sang sang po'i dbyangs kyi le'u 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs dang lhan cig tu
208b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' byeg khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyang cu chu ba ni gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags pa de dag thams cad kyis/ gzugs thams cad yang dag par ldan pa/ 
208b3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa de dag gis kyang gzugs thams cad yang dag
208b4(mdo sde): par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i da rangs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
208b5(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcu ma pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi
208b6(mdo sde): bsrel gyi mchod rten la yangs shing rgya che ba'i mchod pa byas pas rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs par zhugs te/ zhing rnams ni rab tu g.yo bar byed pad+ma'i char
208b7(mdo sde): ni rab tu 'bebs sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni len cing / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis yongs su bskor te mdun du bdar nas// 
208b8(mdo sde): lhan cig tu slar rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+ma'i 'dab ma dri ma med ba skar
209a1(mdo sde): ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du bdag gis sems can gyi don gyis so// bcom ldan
209a2(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi ring srel gyi mchod rten yang mthong ngo // phyag kyang bgyis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
209a3(mdo sde): pabashAkya thub pa yang mthong ste/ phyag bgyis so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de yang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi shugs thob
209a4(mdo sde): padang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu sbyin pa de yang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag thams cad kyis kyang
209a5(mdo sde): gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob paragyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang sang po'i dbyangs 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ 
209a6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' bzhi khri nyis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad ma'i dpal gyis kyang / dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i ting nge
209a7(mdo sde): 'dzin thob par gyur to// sang sang po'i dbyangs kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shurtsa gsum pa'o// bam po bcu gsum pa stem ma'o// 
209a8(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ blo gros mi bzad bstan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i ldangs la btsugs te/ @
209b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das gal ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ #
209b2(mdo sde): slad du spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ blo gros mi bzad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
209b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di la sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gang dag myong bar gyur pa de dag gis gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming
209b4(mdo sde): thos na de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po de las yongs sumar bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag da byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs
209b5(mdo sde): dbang phyug gi mang 'dzin pa de dag gal te/ me'i phung por lhung yang de dag thams cad/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzing rdzi
209b6(mdo sde): kyis/ me'i phung po chen por lhung na yang de dag gal te/ chu klung dag gis khyer la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/ chu de dag
209b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis sems can de dag thams cad gting tshugs par byed do// rigs kyi bu gal te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rgya mtsho'i nang du grur zhugs te/ mgron bu dang
209b8(mdo sde): gser dang / nor bu dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / man shel dang / rdo'i snying po dang / byi ru dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po la sogs pa'i phyir dong ba de rnams rlung nag pos/ srin mo'i gling du
210a1(mdo sde): 'jug par gyur la/ de nas sems can gcig 'ga' zhig gis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bos na/ de dag thams cad srin mo'i gling de nas thar par 'gyur ro// 
210a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces btags so// rigs kyi bu gal te/ bsad par bskor ba las spyan ras gzi
210a3(mdo sde): dbang phyug la bos na/ gshed ma de dag gi mtshon cha dum bu dum bur chag cing grugs par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gnod sbyin dang / srin
210a4(mdo sde): bos gang bar gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming 'dzin pa la de dag thams cad kyis sdang ba'i sems kyis lta yang mi phod do// 
210a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sems can la la lcags sgrog dang shing sgro ga tu bcug par gyur na/ nyes yod kyang rung nyes med kyang rung / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan
210a6(mdo sde): ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming nas phyung bas/ lcags sgrogs dang shing sgrogs tu bcug pa de dag gis bu ga bye bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
210a7(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu ni de 'dra'o// rigs kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di g.yon can dang chom rkun dang / dgra lag na mtshon cha thogs
210a8(mdo sde): pas gang bar gyur te/ der ded dpon gcig gis 'dron pa mang po phal po che rin po ches phrug pa ded de dong ba las/ 'dod ba de dag gis g.yon can dang chom rkun dang
210b1(mdo sde): dgral gan mtshon thogs pa de dag mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang 'jigs shing skrag ste/ bdag cag sbubs med par shes pa las/ ded dpon des 'dron pa mang po la 'di skad ces ma 'jigs shig
210b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag ma 'jigs shig/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de la sgra skad gcig tu bos shig dang deng khyod chom
210b3(mdo sde): rkun gyis 'jigs pa dang dgra yis 'jigs pa 'di las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro zhes bsgo la/ de nas 'dron pa mang po thams cad kyi sgra skad gcig tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
210b4(mdo sde): bos te/ 'jigs pa med pa sbyin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras dgazigs dbang phyug de la phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshalo zhes ming
210b5(mdo sde): nas byung ma thag tu 'dron pa phal po che de dag 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar par gyur te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras
210b6(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug gi mthu ni de dang 'dra'o// rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag 'dod chags spyad pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
210b7(mdo sde): dbang phyug de la phyag byas na/ 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag zhe sdang la spyod pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzig
210b8(mdo sde): dbang phyug la phyag byas na/ zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ro// sems can gang dag gti mug spyad pa de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzig
211a1(mdo sde): dbang phyug la phyag byas na gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang
211a2(mdo sde): drug ni rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// rigs kyi bu su bud med bu 'dod pa gang la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal na/ de las bu'o byung ste/ gzugs
211a3(mdo sde): bzang ba mdzes la blta na sdug pa khye'u yi mtshan dang ldan pa skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'byung ngo // gang bu mo 'dod pa de sang bu mo 'byung ste/ gzugs
211a4(mdo sde): bzang ba mdzes la blta ni sdug pa bu mo'i mtshan ma dang ldan dpa re/ skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
211a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ gi mthuni de 'dra'o// gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// spyan ras gzigs dbang
211a6(mdo sde): phyug la phyag 'tshal ba de dag don yod pa'i 'bras bur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 
211a7(mdo sde): ming 'dzin pa gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa dang yang gang zhig sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung
211a8(mdo sde): drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag la/ na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang / gzims cha dang snyun gyi gsol sman dang yo byad kyis
211b1(mdo sde): mchod pa byed na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa ji tsam zhig skyed/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems
211b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi bzad pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag gni de las bsod nams skyed pa ni/ bcom ldan
211b3(mdo sde): 'das mang 'gas so// bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de snyed la bkur bsti byas
211b4(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / gang gis dpan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag lan gcig byas pa dang / ming
211b5(mdo sde): 'dzin pa bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gnyi ga mnyam ste/ lhag pa yang med 'phags pa yang med de/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung drug cu rtsa
211b6(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bye ma snyed la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa dang / gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal zhing ming 'dzin pa'i bsod nams kyi
211b7(mdo sde): phung po de gnyi ga de skal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar yang zad par bya bar sla ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ming
211b8(mdo sde): 'dzin pa de dag gi bsod nams de ltar dpag tu med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi bzad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// 
212a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'din rnam par rgyu/ ji ltar sems can/ 
212a2(mdo sde): rnams la chos ston/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis thabs mkhas pa'i yul ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
212a3(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi bzad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
212a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi sems can rnams la chos ston pa'i de 'jig rten gyi khams ngag yod do// gang dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs
212a5(mdo sde): dbang phyug byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyis chos ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag kyang yod do// sems can kha cig la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyan
212a6(mdo sde): ras gzigs dbang phyug rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis chos ston to// kha cig la nyan thos kyi gzugs kyis kha cig la tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis kha cig la brgya byin
212a7(mdo sde): gyi gzugs kyis/ sems can kha cig la ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dri za'i gzugs kyis chos ston to// gnod sbyin gyis 'dul ba'i sems
212a8(mdo sde): can nams la ni/ gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis chos ston to// dbang phyug gis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ dbang phyug gi gzugs kyis rgyas ston to// dbang phyug chen pos
212b1(mdo sde): 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs kyis chos ston to// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'dul ba'i sems can rnams lan 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po
212b2(mdo sde): gzugs kyis chos ston to// sha zas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la n-i sha za'i gzugs kyi chos ston to// mchog gis 'dul pa'i sems can rnams la ni/ mchog gi gzugs

212b6(mdo sde): chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod cig/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'di 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams la mi 'jis
212b7(mdo sde): basbyin paH/ da byor 'jig rten gyi khams ma mjed 'din/ ma 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes kun gyis shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la blo gros ma bzang pas 'di skad ces
212b8(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la chos kyis dgapa bstsal bar bgyi'o// 
213a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes na byin cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi bzad pas bdag gi mgul
213a2(mdo sde): nas/ srang brgya stong ri ba'i mu tig gi do shal bkrol nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la chos kyi dgab pa byin te/ skyes bu dam pa bdag las chos kyi dgab
213a3(mdo sde): pa 'di long shig/ des ma blangs nas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi bzad pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs
213a4(mdo sde): dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mu tig gi do shal 'di bdag la snying rtse ba'i phyir long shig// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
213a5(mdo sde): gzigs dbang phyug gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po blo gros mi bzad pa la snying brtse ba dnga'akhor bzhi po de dag dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod
213a6(mdo sde): sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la snying brtse ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa' sems
213a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po/ blo gros mi bzad pa las mu tig gi do shal blangs so// blangs nas cha gnyis su bgos te/ bgos nas cha gcig ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phul lo// cha gcig
213a8(mdo sde): ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang gi rin po che'i mchod rten la phul lo// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan
213b1(mdo sde): ras gzigs dbang phyug 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'din de lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul bas rnam par rgyu'o// de la de'i chos nyid ni 'di skad ces bya'o// rgyal mtshan khro bos blo gros mi bzang la/ 
213b2(mdo sde): de'i don gyi ku ni kun dris pa rgyal ba'i sras po 'di ltar ci'i phyir// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po zhes 'di bgyi// des ni de'i phyogs rnams kun bsdus te/ smon lam rgya mtsho bro gros
213b3(mdo sde): mi bzad pas/ rgyal mtshan khro bos de la 'di skad smras/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i spyod pa nyon// bskal pa bsam yas bye ba du ma brgya// sangs rgyas stong phrag bye ba mang po la// 
213b4(mdo sde): smon lam ji ltar rab tu rnam par spangs/ de dag kho bo sa rab tu bshad kyis nyon// nyan par byas sam 'on te/ blta bar byed// rims kyis de ltar rjes su dran pa yang / 
213b5(mdo sde): srog chags rnams ni 'bras bu yod par 'gyur// sdugabasngal sred pa mya ngan kun sel byed// gal te gsod/ pas me'i dong du yang // gsad par bya phyir gtang ba'i yid
213b6(mdo sde): kyis ni// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni/ chus btab bzhin du me dag zhi bar 'gyur// rgya mtsho dang ni mi ngan rgal na yang // klu dang 'byung po lha ma yin gnas su// spyan ras/ 
213b7(mdo sde): gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// chu yi rgyal por nams kyang mi nub bo// rab tu sdang ba'i yid kyis bsad pa'i phyir/ ri rab lhun po'i rtse nas bor na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran
213b8(mdo sde): nan// nyam lta bung rnag pa' gnas par 'gyur// gal ti rje lan rangag kyang // gas dang byang na srubar 'ongs na yang / kun ras gzigs kyang bang badran no// bsngal lu
214a1(mdo sde): gtses par mnus so// gsad pa'i sems kyis lag na mtshon thogs te/ dgra tshogs mang pos kun tu bskor na yang // spun ras gzigs kyi dbang badranan no// 
214a2(mdo sde): de mthag tu byams pa'i sems su gyur// gal te gsad pa nye bar 'ongs nas su// gshed ma mi'i dbang du gyur na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// de yi mtshon cha dum du
214a3(mdo sde): dum bur 'gyur// de ste shing ngam lcags las byas pa yi// khong sgril dang ni gsod kyis bcings na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// bcings pa myur du rnam par chad/ 
214a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur// sngags dang stobs dang sman dang rigs sngags da dang // ro langs pa dang 'byung po lus 'jigs pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// gang nas rab tu
214a5(mdo sde): gtang ba der slar 'gro// gnod sbyin lnga min 'byung po klu 'a rab// mdangs 'phogs pa yis yongs su bskor na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// 
214a6(mdo sde): spu khung tsam gtses par yong mi nus// mchi ba sen rnom rab tu 'jigs pa yi// gcan zan ma rungs pa yis bskor na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// myur bar
214a7(mdo sde): phyogs kun tu yang 'gro bar 'gyur// mig 'jigs me lce lta bur 'od 'phro ba// migadug pa can gyis yongs su bskor na yang // spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// shin tu myur bar
214a8(mdo sde): 'dug pa med par 'gyur// bzang po klog kyang 'byung zhing stug pa yi// sprin las lce dang ser ba char 'bab pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran na ni// de ma thag tu myur bar rab tu zhi// 
214b1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal mang po brgya yis gses pa dang // sdug bsngal mang pos gzer ba'i sems can mthong // ye shes dge ba'i stobs kyis spyan ras gzigs// de bas lhar bcas 'gro ba'i skyob pa bo// 
214b2(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis pha rol song ba ste// thabs dang ye shes yangs pa bslabs pas na// phyogs bcu'i 'gro ba mang po thams cad dang // ma lus zhing kun tu yang rab tu snang // srog chags/ 
214b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa dang // mi khom pa dang sems can dmyal ba dang // byol song dang na gshin rjes bsgo ba dang // skyergan pas gzir ba mthar ni byed// shin tu dge ba'i spyan te byams
214b4(mdo sde): pa'i spyan// thabs dang shes rab khyad par yod pa'i spyan/ snying rje'i spyan dang byams pa'i spyan dang ldan// zhal ba zang spyan bzang shin tu blta 'dod pa// dri ma med pa dri ma
214b5(mdo sde): bral ba'i 'od // rab rib med pa ye shes nyi ma'i 'od// sprin gyi chod pa med par gyur pa'i 'od// 'jig rten dag na lhag ge lhang nger mdzes// snying rje las byung tshul
214b6(mdo sde): khrims grags pa ste// dge ba'i yon tan byams yid sprin chen po// srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs me zhi byed// chos kyi char pa bdud rtsi rab tu 'bebs// 'thab mo dang ni rtsod cing kye
214b7(mdo sde): ba ye/ 'jigs chen gdul dang skyes bu song na yang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang badran nano// de ma thag tu dgra rnams rab tu ni// sngon gyi sgra dang rnga'i tshe dra// 'drug sa/ 
214b8(mdo sde): sgra dang tshangs pa'i byangs snyan pa// dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor pha rol phyin pa ste// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang dran par bya// dag pa'i sems can spyan ras gzigs dbang po// bcom
215a1(mdo sde): ma thadran byos dran par gyis// 'chi ba'i tshe dang nyon mongs gces pa'i// mgon dang skyabs dang dpung gnyen du yang 'gyur// yon tan thams cad kyi ni pha rol phyin/ 
215a2(mdo sde): sems can kun la snying rje byams pa'i spyan// yang dag yon tan yon tan rgyam chem// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po phyag byar 'os// 'di ltar 'gro ba rnams la snying brtse ba// phyi ma'i dus na sangs rgyas
215a3(mdo sde): su yang 'gyur// 'jigs dang mya ngan thams cad 'jig byed pa// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dran par bya// 'jig rten dbang po rgyal po gtso bo ste// dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten
215a4(mdo sde): mchod// bskal pa brgya phrag mang por spyad nas su/ rdul bral bla na med pa byang chub thob// 'dren pa snang ba mtha' yas g.yas g.yon na// bsil yab thogs te
215a5(mdo sde): de bzhin g.yob cing 'dug/ sgyum lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rgyu sa kyang // zhing rnams kun tu song nas rgyal ba mchod/ nub kyi phyogs na bde ba'i 'byung gnas te// rdul bral 'dzi/ 
215a6(mdo sde): rten khams ni bde bcan// de na sems can kha lo sgyur ba yi// 'dren pa tshe mtha' yas pa'angang ltar bzhugs// der ni bud med rnams kyang mi 'byung ste// rnam pa kun tu g.yem pa'i chos
215a7(mdo sde): med do// rgyal ba'i sras po de dag rngus te skye// dri ma med pa'i bad+ma'i snying por 'dug/ 'dren pa tshe mtha' yas pa de nyid kyang // pad+ma 'iri snying bar dri med dga' ba la// seng ge'i khril rab tu
215a8(mdo sde): bzhugs pa yang // sru nga'i rgyal po lta bur rnam par mdzes// 'jig rten 'dren pa 'di yang de bzhin te// srid pa gsum na de 'dra mang med do// gang gis spyan ras gzigs dbang ming thos pa
215b1(mdo sde): de'i bsod nams dag ni mi zad 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'dzin stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas la
215b2(mdo sde): btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das su dag byang chub sems dpa' sems
215b3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi le'u/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang gi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa kun mas sgo'i le'u spyan ras gzigs
215b4(mdo sde): dbang phyug gi rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngan dang ldan pa lags so// kun nas sgo'i le'u bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das
215b5(mdo sde): kyis bshad pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags brgyad/ khri bzhi stong gis mi mnyam pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// 
215b6(mdo sde): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par 'phrul ba bstan pa kun nas sgo'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cadad/ 
215b7(mdo sde): ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na bskal pa mthong na dga' ba la 'jig rten gyi khams
215b8(mdo sde): rnam par snang ba'i 'od par gyis brgyan par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'du
216a1(mdo sde): pa'i kha lo bsgyur ba/ blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal ba me tog kun tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba 'jan
216a2(mdo sde): rten du byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gsung rab la/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod
216a3(mdo sde): pade'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin zhes bya ba zhig yod de// rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge bkod pa de la bu gnyis yod do// gcig gi ming ni dri ma med pa'i mig ste/ khye'u de gnyis rdzu 'phrul dang
216a4(mdo sde): ldan pa/ shes rab dang ldan pa/ bsod nams dang ldan// ye shes dang ldan te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod padal brtson par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
216a5(mdo sde): byin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
216a6(mdo sde): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dgal/ 
216a7(mdo sde): btsun par zung to// thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// dri ma med pa 'tshang nge 'dzin gyi rol tu bang ngo // rgyun dadang ga sa dang nyim ting nge 'dzin gyi ba rab tu sa ngo // drimadzad/ 
216a8(mdo sde): pa da ting na ci pa ba nga // rlo dpa'i dgasal pa 'a gyi ba tu nga //  na gyi 'an tha par ba kyasang ngo // gapal ldan pa / 
216b1(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu song bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de yang de'i tshe de'i 'dus na/ sems can de dag la thugs brtse ba dang / rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la thugs brtse ba'i phyiradam
216b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston to// rigs kyi bu de nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig bdag cag skyed pa'i mgal ba der song ste// phyin nas sor
216b3(mdo sde): mo bcu thal mo sbyar te bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so// yum tshur spyon/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyas
216b4(mdo sde): snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
216b5(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me to/ kun tu rgyas pa de'i drung du bzhud do// de ci'i slad du zhen/ yum bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
216b6(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par rang
216b7(mdo sde): tu 'chad kyis de mnyan pa'i phyir bzhud do// rigs kyi bu dag de skad ces smras nas/ rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / dri ma med pa'i mig la ji
216b8(mdo sde): skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag khyod kyi pa rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'di brim ze la dang pas de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta ba'i phyir 'grar mi ster to// rigs kyi bung dgade nas khye'u/ 
217a1(mdo sde): ma med pa'i snying po dang / khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar nas/ bdag cag skyed pa'i ma la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag log par lha 'a
217a2(mdo sde): khyim du skyes te/ bdag cag chos kyi rgyal po'i bu ma lags pa lta/ rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pas khye'u de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis
217a3(mdo sde): bdag cag gi pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la snying brtse ba'i phyir cho 'phrul cung zad cig legs par ston cig dang / khyed la dad par 'gyur yang srid kyis/ sems dad par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de
217a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa das rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gan du 'dong bar gnang ngo // rigs kyi bu dag de
217a5(mdo sde): nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / khye'u dri ma me dpa'i mig gis de'i tshe ta la bdun srid du nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ pha rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de la snying brtse
217a6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i cho 'phrul zung du byed de/ de dag na mkha' bar snang de la dong nas nyal bar byed do// bar snang de la 'chag go// bar snang de la rdul sprug go// bar snang de/ 
217a7(mdo sde): nyid la lus kyi spyad nas chu'i rgyun gtong zhing lus kyi snod nas mo'i phung po rab tu 'bar bar byed do// lus kyi stod nas chu'i rgyun gtong zhing lus kyi nang nas me'i phung po rab tu 'bar bar byed de/ 
217a8(mdo sde): de dganas pa 'di nyid la chen par gyur nas/ chung ngur gyur nas chen por gyur to// bar snang de nyid las mi snang bar gyur te/ sa las byung ngo // sa las byung nas nam kha' la 'bag gi
217b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag khye'u de nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul de nyid kyis rang gi ba rgyal po dge ba bkod pa btul to// rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas khye'u de gnyis kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag mthong nas de'i
217b2(mdo sde): / tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing bde ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ khye'u de dag la 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi ston pa su khyed
217b3(mdo sde): su'i slob ma zhes smras so// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
217b4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la rin po che'i byang chub kyi shing drung na/ chos kyi gdan
217b5(mdo sde): la bzhugs te/ lha dang bcas bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun na/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs rgyas par rab tu 'chad pa'i
217b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de ni bdag cag gi ston pa ste/ rgyal po chen po bdag cag ni/ de'i slob ma'o// rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas khye'u de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras so// 
217b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi ston pa blta zhing / bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du bdag kyang 'gro'o// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis bar snang de las babs nas/ bdag cag skyed pa'i ma gal ba
217b8(mdo sde): der song ste phyin nas/ sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar te/ bdag cag bskyed pa'i mal 'di skad ces smras so// yum bdag cag gis yab 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu btul
218a1(mdo sde): lags so// bdag cag gis rab kyi ston pa 'gyi ba bgyis so// bdag cag bcom ldan 'das de las rab tu byung na/ yum ngani bdag cag gtang ba'i rigs so// 
218a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u dri ma med pa'i snying po dang / khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig gis de'i tshe bdag cag bskyed pa'i mal tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag smras so// khyim med rab tu 'byung bar ni/ yum gyis
218a3(mdo sde): bdag cag gnang bar mdzod// de bzhin gshegs pa rnyed par dka'// bdag cag rab tu 'byung bar bgyi// u dum 'ba' ra'i me tog ltar// rgyal ba shin tu rnyed par dka'// dal ba 'byor pa'ang
218a4(mdo sde): rnyed dka' bas// rab tu 'byung gis gtang du gsol// rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pas smras pa/ de ring da khyed gnyis gtang bar bya// byis pa dag go legs par
218a5(mdo sde): dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnyed dka' bas// bdag kya rab tu 'byung bar bya// rigs kyi bu dag khye'u de dag gis tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas// bdag gis pa dang / 
218a6(mdo sde): mde dag la 'di skad ces smras so// yab yum legs so tshur spyon// khyed dang thams cad lhan cig bzhud do// bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang // phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi
218a7(mdo sde): ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs san skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i drung du bzhung ngo // 
218a8(mdo sde): slad du zhen/ yab sum sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ste/ udus 'ba' nga ma tog dang 'dra zhing / gnya' shing gi bu gang ru sbal gyi mgrin pa chung ba dang 'dri ba'i srang du'o// 
218b1(mdo sde): yab yum sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag 'byung ba rnyed par dka' ste/ de bas na yab yum bdag cag bsod nams mchog gis brtan pa'i gsung rab 'di lta bu la skyes te/ yab yum bdag cag
218b2(mdo sde): gtang na legs te/ bdag cag mtsho zhing / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas
218b3(mdo sde): ba'i stan pa la rab tu 'byung ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rab sum de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na rnyed par dka' ba dang / da ltar gyi dus na 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi rgyal po rnyed par dka' ba dang
218b4(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i dal ba 'byor pa shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i slad du da'o// rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe na/ rgyal po dge bab dkod pa de'i btsun mo'i 'khor las slas brgyad khri bzhi
218b5(mdo sde): stong dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i sna da du gyur to// khye'u dri ma med pa'i mig dang dri ma med ba'i snying pos chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la spyad de/ bskal pabye
218b6(mdo sde): ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ngan song thams cad ji ltar bskul snyam nas/ sems can thams cad kyi ngan song thams cad sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin la spyad par gyur to// khye'u de dag gi ma dri ma med pa
218b7(mdo sde): byin pa rgyal po'i chung ma de yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kun bstan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gsang ba'i gnas shes so// rigs kyi bu dag de nas khye'u de gnyis kyis rgyal
218b8(mdo sde): po dge ba bkod pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la btul te/ zhugs par byas nas/ yongs su smin par byas te/ mnyen mdab dang / rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa de dang / 
219a1(mdo sde): mnyen mad nga dang / rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i bu khye'u de gnyis kyang srog chags pa ni khri nyis stong dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas te thams cad
219a2(mdo sde): 'grogs nas ldan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de ga la ba der song ste/ 
219a3(mdo sde): phyin nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan
219a4(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po dme tog kun tu rgyas pa des rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'khor dang
219a5(mdo sde): bcas pa lpags par mkhyen nas chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu legs par yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang / 
219a6(mdo sde): dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan 'das des rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu legs par yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par
219a7(mdo sde): 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// rigs kyi bu dag de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la chos kyi gtam gyis shin tu
219a8(mdo sde): legs par yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par dga' bar mdzad pas/ de'i tshe tshim zhing mgu la yid rang te rab tu/ 
219b1(mdo sde): dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ nu bo cod pan gyis bcings te rgyal por bcug nas/ bu dang gnyen 'dab dang / 'khor dang bcas pa dang rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas
219b2(mdo sde): byin pa de yang bud med kyi 'khor thams cad dang / khye'u de gnyis dang lhan cig tu srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu 'grogs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
219b3(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de'i gsung rab la/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/ rab tu byung nas
219b4(mdo sde): rgyal po dge ba bkod pa 'khor dang bcas pas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grang des 'di la bsam pa dang / bsgom pa dang / kun chub par bya/ 
219b5(mdo sde): bal brtson par gyur to// rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das nas yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
219b6(mdo sde): thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin thob ma thag tu de'i tshe na mkha' la ta la bdun tsam du 'phags so// de nas rigs kyi bu dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa na mkha'i dkyil du 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das
219b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
219b8(mdo sde): gi bu 'di gnyis ston pa lags te/ gang 'di dag gis rdzu 'phrul gyis lta bar gyur pa chen po de las bzlog ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu bzhag go/ yongs su/ 
220a1(mdo sde): smin par bgyis/ zhugs par bgyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba'i slad du yang skul to// bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di gnyis bdag
220a2(mdo sde): gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dran par bgyi ba'i slad du bu'i gzugs kyis bdag gi khyim du skyes so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de
220a3(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pas/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
220a4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen pa de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams ni srid pa'i 'gro ba dang / 'chi 'pho'i gnas thams
220a5(mdo sde): cad du skyes pan yang gang dag ston pa'i byed pas nye bar gnasapa dang / gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang 'dzud pa dang / yongs su smin
220a6(mdo sde): par byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed sla bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa de bzhin gshegs pa ltar 'dzud pa'i gnas 'di ni
220a7(mdo sde): rgya che ba'o// rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di gnyis mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
220a8(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di gnyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung drug cu rtsa lnga'i bye ma snyed la mchod par byed do// sems
220b1(mdo sde): can rnams la snying ba'arje ba'i phyir/ log par lta ba'i sems can rnams yang dag par lta ba la brtson 'grus bskyed pa'i phyir/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rigs/ 
220b2(mdo sde): kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa na mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/ sor mo bcu thal ma sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
220b3(mdo sde): 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta bu'i ye shes dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
220b4(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi slad du dbu'i gtsug tor rnam par mdzes/ spyan dri ma ma mchi sa pa lags/ smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes shing zla ba dang / 
220b5(mdo sde): dung ltar dkar la mdzes mnyam zhing thags bzang ba'i tshems kyis 'phreng ba zhal gyi nang nas mdzes/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgros me tog bim pa ltar dmar ba dang / bde bar
220b6(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i spyan mdzes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bshad du gsol// rigs kyi bu dag de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pas/ yon tan de snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das de
220b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa de la mngon par bstod nas/ yon tan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
220b8(mdo sde): gzhan dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das de la bstod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun
221a1(mdo sde): tu rgyas pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'ang don che zhing yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i chos
221a2(mdo sde): 'dul ba gsungs te/ ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pas bslabs pa legs par bcas pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad bdag slar sems kyi dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o// slar
221a3(mdo sde): log pa lta ba'i dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o// slar khro ba'i dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o// slar sdig pa'i sems bskyed pa'i dbang du mchi bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag
221a4(mdo sde): me dge ba'i chos 'di snyed dang ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'ad/ sa kyi drung du mchi bar mi 'tshal lo zhes smras te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
221a5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bar snang la song ste 'dug go/ 
221a6(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dang / rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa des srang brgya stong ri ba'i mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi bar snang la gtor to// mu tig gi
221a7(mdo sde): rgyan 'phreng de gtor ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi steng na mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng gi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka ba bzhi zug pa ngos mnyam pa shin tu rnam par phye ba bltan
221a8(mdo sde): sdug pa gnas par gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa der ras bcos bubargya stong du ma bting ba'i khri byung ngo // khri de la de bzhin gshegs pa sku skyil mo krung bcas te/ bzhugs par snang // 
221b1(mdo sde): de nas rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di ni mthu che zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di ltar de/ 
221b2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus na mdzes shing blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa gda'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
221b3(mdo sde): pa 'brug sgra dbyangs snyan skar ma'i rgyal po me tog kun tu rgyas pas 'khor bzhi po de dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pa na mkha'i dkyil na 'dug cing seng ge'i sgra sgrogs
221b4(mdo sde): pa mthong ngam/ gsol pa mthong lags so// bcom da ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po dge ba bkod pas nga'i bstan pa la dge slong gi tshul du byas
221b5(mdo sde): nas/ bskal pa mngon 'phags rgyal po zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyi khams yangs ldan du de bzhin gshegs padagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
221b6(mdo sde): rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sa
221b7(mdo sde): la'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po de byang chub
221b8(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten khams yangs ldan yang lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur ro// 
222a1(mdo sde): de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe
222a2(mdo sde): de'i dus na// rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za bar gyur na/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar mi
222a3(mdo sde): blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po padama'i dpal 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa zhes dra bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu dag
222a4(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa zhes/ bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod som nyi'am/  yid gnyis sam/ the tsom za bar gyur na/ rigs kyi bu
222a5(mdo sde): dag khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhen byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par snang ba'i 'od zer gyis brgyan pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dzi/ 
222a6(mdo sde): nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i chung ma dri ma med pas byin pa zhes bya ba gyur te/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa dang / sems can de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ rgyal po dge ba bkod pa'i/ 
222a7(mdo sde): chung mar des khas blangs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/ khye'u de gnyis su gyur pa de gzhan dgacig yin snyam du khyed som nyi'am/ yid gnyis sam/ 
222a8(mdo sde): bcom za bar gyur na/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sman gyi rgyal po dang / sman yang dag 'phags 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na
222b1(mdo sde): rgyal po dge ba bkod pa de'i bur gyur to// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sman gyi rgyal po dang / sman yang dag 'phags gnyis yon tan bsam
222b2(mdo sde): gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyi ga yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyis yang dag par 'phags
222b3(mdo sde): pa'o// gang dag skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis kyi ming 'dzin pa de dag thams cad kyang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags brgyad
222b4(mdo sde): khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang / bral ba rnam par dag go/ rgyal po dge ba bkod dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ nyi shu
222b5(mdo sde): rtsa lnga'o// / de nas byang/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzangapo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang
222b6(mdo sde): pa las 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang
222b7(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis kyang / yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'dar te/ lhan cig tu shar phyogs nas zhing dag ni rab tu g.yo bar byed/ pad+ma'i char ni rab
222b8(mdo sde): 'bebs/ sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig pargya stong ni rab tu len cing / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang / byang chu
223a1(mdo sde): sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i che ba nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzi brjid chen po 'bar ba dang / byang chub sems
223a2(mdo sde): dnga'i theg pa chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mo 'am ci dang / 
223a3(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mo ma yin pa'i rnam par 'phrul ba chen po dang / de ltar rdzu 'phrul chu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab padag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po 'jig rten/ 
223a4(mdo sde): khangs mi mjed 'dir byin nas/ de rab rgyal ba byad kyi phung po ga' ba dang / bcom ldan 'das galas dader song na phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la na/ 
223a5(mdo sde): bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das
223a6(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog gzi brjid mngon 'phags rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dir mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dzin/ dam pa'i chos badra
223a7(mdo sde): dkar ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa de mnyan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung du bdag mchis so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
223a8(mdo sde): sems dpa'ab tu stong 'di snyed 'di dag dram pa'i chos bad+mad gar ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mnyan pa'i slang du mchis so// de'i slang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs padag bcom
223b1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di rnams la rgya cher legs par bshad du
223b2(mdo sde): gsol// de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
223b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po 'di dag/ mgo smos pa tsam gyis khong du chud pa sha stag go// dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar ba 'chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'/ 
223b4(mdo sde): dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags so// bde bar gshegs pa de lta lags so// 
223b5(mdo sde): de nas 'khor der dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma 'dus pa de dag dam pa'i chos de dag pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rab tu dgang
223b6(mdo sde): pa'i phyir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i bung med kyi tshu pa / 
223b7(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di lag tu thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed/ 
223b8(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / nges pa'i phung po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur / 
224a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i bud med kyis dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lag tu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang / 
224a2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la bsrung
224a3(mdo sde): bar bgyi'o// bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar bgyi'o// dug gzhil bar bgyi'o// ci nas chos smra ba de la glags blta ba dang / skabs tshol ba gang dag gis kyang glags mi rnyed
224a4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud sdig can dang bdud kyi bu rnams dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / bdud kyi bu rnams dang bdud kyi 'khor glags lta ba dang / skabs tshol ba rnams
224a5(mdo sde): kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba nas/ bdud kun nas ldang ba'i bar du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha'i bu dang / ga/ nod sbyin dang / yi dgas dang / srul po dang / gshed byed
224a6(mdo sde): dang / ro langs dag las 'gyur ba nas/ bdud kyi skabs tshol nas yang skabs rnyed par mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos smra ba de la rtag par rgyun tu dus thams cad gsungs par bgyi
224a7(mdo sde): bskyab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe chos smra ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems shing rnal 'byor la brtson pa dang / 'chags pa la zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ chos kyi rnam
224a8(mdo sde): grangs 'di bsrung ba'i slad du/ bdag glang po che'i rgyal po thal kar che ba drug pa la 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas chos smra ba de'i 'chag pa'i gnas su
224b1(mdo sde): chos smra ba de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o// gang gi tshe chos smra bde chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la sems shing rnal 'byor kyi rje su zhugs pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las than tshig dang yi ge gcig tsam yang
224b2(mdo sde): lan 'ga' nor bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag glang po che'i rgyal po thal kar mche ba drug pa la 'tshal nas chos smra ba de la bdag gi ngo bstan te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma nyams par zlos su stsal to/ 
224b3(mdo sde): chos smra ba des bdag gi lus mthong zhing chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma nyams par bdag las thos nas tshim zhing mgul yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas
224b4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson 'grus brtsom mo// bdagamathong ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// gzungs 'khyil ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// 
224b5(mdo sde): byeb brgya stong du 'khyil ba zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyurar ro// sgra thams cad la mkhas pa zhes bgyi b.ragazungs thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das spang
224b6(mdo sde): ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang mdo sde 'di lta bu yi ger 'dri ba dang / 
224b7(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di lta bu tshol ba dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu klog pa dang gang dag slad ma'i dus slad ma'i tshe lnga brgya tha ma la/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ched du gdugs bdun sum nyi shu gcig tu 'chagacing
224b8(mdo sde): brtson par gyur na de dag la bdag gis sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba'i lus bstan par bgyi'o// glang ba che'i rgyal po thal kar mche ba drug pa la 'tshal te/ byang
225a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ gdugs nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la chos smra ba de dag 'chag pa'i thang du mchi'o// mchis nas chos smra ba de dag la yang dag par
225a2(mdo sde): bstan par bgyi'o// yang dag par 'dzin tu stsal bar bgyi'o// yang dag par gzeng bstod par bgyi'o// yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bgyi'o// de dag la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o// ci nas
225a3(mdo sde): chos smra ba de dag la sus kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur ba dang / de dag la mi 'am mi ma lags pas glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / bud med kyis 'phrog par mi 'gyur bar de dag la bsrung bar bgyi'o// 
225a4(mdo sde): bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o// chad pa spang bar bgyi'o// dug gzhil bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de dag la bdag gis gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag stsal bar
225a5(mdo sde): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dgagasan du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ a dan De/ daN Da ba ti/ daN Da brta na/ daN+Da ra ku sha le/ daN Da su d+ha ri/ su d+ha ri/ 
225a6(mdo sde): su d+ha ra pa ti/ bud d+ha pa sh+ya ni/ d+hA ra Ni/ a brta ni/ a brta ni/ a brta ni sang ga pa rik+She te/ sang g+ha nir g+ha sa ne/ d+harma ba rik+She te/ sarba satwa/ ru ta ko shalpa/ a nu ga te sang ga/ bi kri Dita/ 
225a7(mdo sde): a nu brte/ brta ni/ brta li swA hA// bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag/ byang chub sems dpa' gang gi rna ba'i dbang po la grags pa ni byang chub
225a8(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzung po'i byin gyi brlabs su rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na spyod pa na
225b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gi lag tu thob par gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i gzi brjid kyis dam
225b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag gi lag tu thob bo snyam du de ltar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub
225b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro// sems can de dag gis sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
225b4(mdo sde): pa'i phyag gis spyi bo la byug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de dag gis bdag kyang dga' bar bgyis par 'gyur ro// gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'drir stsol ba dang / gang dag 'di'i don
225b5(mdo sde): khong du chud par bgyid pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di sa ger bris pa de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang bskal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/ skyes
225b6(mdo sde): ma thag tu de'i drung du lha'i bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong mchi bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag rnga bo che tsam gyis cod pan dang / lha'i bu de dag gi nang du gnas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs
225b7(mdo sde): 'di yi ger bris pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po yang 'di 'dra lags na/ gang dag lung nod pa dang / kha don bgyid pa dang / sems pa dang / yid la bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bcom ldan 'das
225b8(mdo sde): de lta lags pas/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems kyis kun bsams te/ yi ger bri bar bgyi'o// gang mi g.yeng bas yid la bgyid pas yi ger bris na de la
226a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas stong gis phyag brkyong bar 'gyur ro// mchi ba'i tshe sangs rgyas stong gi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro// ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mchis par mi 'gyur ro// 'di
226a2(mdo sde): nas shi 'phos nas kyang dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang bskal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur te/ gang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa de byang
226a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis mdun gyis bltas te/ chos 'chad pa der skye'o// de lta lags pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ 
226a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pas/ dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i tshe sa kyi rnam grangs 'di gus par yi ger bri bar bgyi'o// gus par lung mnod par bgyi'o// gus par kha ton du bgyi'o/ 
226a5(mdo sde): gus par yid la bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grang / sa 'di yi ger bris pa dang / lung mnos pa dang / kha ton bgyis pa dang / bsgoms pa dang / yid la bgyis
226a6(mdo sde): ba ni de ltar yon tan dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs bu mo mkhas pas dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
226a7(mdo sde): gzung bar bgyis te/ de dag gi yon tan gyi phan yon 'di snyed du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta lags pas ci nas bdag gi byin gyis rlabs kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam+bu'i gling
226a8(mdo sde): 'di na spyod par 'gyur bar bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
226b1(mdo sde): shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu zang po la kun tu bzang po khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan zhing snying
226b2(mdo sde): rje chen pos zin pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa yis zin pa'i sems bskyed pas/ khyod kyis chos smra ba de dag la byin gyis rlob par byed pa lag so legs so zhes legs so zhes
226b3(mdo sde): bya ba byin no// rigs kyi bu gang la la dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i ming 'dzin pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
226b4(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gnan sa thos pa dang / de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya
226b5(mdo sde): thub pa mchod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos bstan pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
226b6(mdo sde): pa shAkya thub pas de dag gi spyi bor phyag bzhag pa dang / de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la chos gos kyi g.yogs par rig par bya'o// kun tu bzang po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
226b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzin par rig par bya'o// de dag 'jig rten rgyang pan pa la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag snyan dngags la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la dga' ba mi
226b8(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de dag gar byed pa dang / rol mo byed pa dang / gyad dang / sha 'tshong dang / shen pa dang / bya gag 'tshong ba dang / phag 'tshong ba dang / bud med gso ba'i sems can nam
227a1(mdo sde): la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro// mdo sde 'di lta bu thos pa dang / yi ger bris pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / blags pa de dag gzhan la sred par mi 'gyur ro// sems can de dag chos kyi
227a2(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de dag so sor bdag nyid tshul bzhin yid la byed par 'gyur ro// rang gi bsod nams kyi stobs bskyed par 'gyur ro// de dag sems can rnams kyis mthong na dga'
227a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// dge slong gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de dag 'dod chags kyis gzir bar mi 'gyur ro// zhe sdang med pa dang / gti mug med pa dang / ser sna med pa dang / 'chab pa med
227a4(mdo sde): pa dang / nga rgyal med pa dang / che ba'i nga rgyal med pa dang / log pa'i nga rgyal med par 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po che sa smra ba de dag bdag gi rnyed pas chog shes par 'gyur ro// kun
227a5(mdo sde): tu bzang po gang dag gi phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ lnga brgya pa tha ma/ la dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong mthong na 'di snyam du rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub
227a6(mdo sde): kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni bdud kyi thal mo'i tshogs las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni chos kyi rnga rdung
227a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// 'di ni chos kyi dung 'bud par 'gyur ro// 'di ni chos kyi char chen po rab tu 'beb par 'gyur ro// 'di ni chos kyi seng ge'i khri la 'dug par 'gyur ro// snyam du sems/ 
227a8(mdo sde): bskyed par bya'o// gang dag phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya'i tha ma la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag brkam par mi 'gyur ro// chos gos la chags pa dang / lhung bzed
227b1(mdo sde): la chags par mi 'gyur ro// chos smra ba de dag drang por 'gyur ro// chos smra ba de dag rnam par thar pa gsum thob par 'gyur ro// de dag gi tshe 'di la bzlog par 'gyur ro// gang dag mang / 
227b2(mdo sde): sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa chos smra ba'i dge slong rnams smod par byed pa'i sems can de dag dmus long du 'gyur ro// gang dag gis mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong rnams la mi snyen par bsgrags na
227b3(mdo sde): de dag tshe 'di nyid la lus la sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu yi ger 'dri ba rnams la 'phya ba dang / sting pa de dag so chag par 'gyur ro// so thags ngan par 'gyur ro// 
227b4(mdo sde): mchu mi sdug par 'gyur ro// lag pa dang rkang pa log par 'gyur ro// mig log par 'gyur ro// lus dri mi zhim par 'gyur ro// lus la bral dang 'brum bu phra mo
227b5(mdo sde): dang / rkang shu dang shu ba dang / g.yan pas gang bar 'gyur ro// gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu yi ger 'dri ba dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu klog pa dang / mang
227b6(mdo sde): sde 'di lta bu 'chad pa rnams la/ mi snyan pa'i tshig bden pa'am mi bden pa bsgrags pa na/ sdig pa'i las de shin tu lci bar rig par bya'o// kun tu bzang po de bas na/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di
227b7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i dge slong la rgyang ma nas kyang ldang bar bya'o// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la gus par bya ba de bzhin du mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag la'ang gus par bya'o// kun tu bzang po smra bar
227b8(mdo sde): bya ba'i le'u 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bye ba brgya stong 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob par gyur to// kun tu bzang po spro bar
228a1(mdo sde): bya la / de na sa gshegs pa sa sa pas par dzugs pas sa rgyas nga
228a2(mdo sde): gdan de las bzhengs te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag bsdus nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad pa yongs su grub pa'i phyag g.yas pas de dag gi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung nas/ de'i tshe'i
228a3(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag ngas bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyed kyi lag tu btang ngo // 
228a4(mdo sde): yongs su btadang do// rjes su gtad do// gzhag go// gta mas so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis ci nas kyang rgya/ cher rgyas par 'gyur bar de ltar gyis shig/ lan gnyis lan
228a5(mdo sde): gsum du yang bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g.yas pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi lag pa/ g.yas pa nas bzung ste 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
228a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu dgangs bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyed kyi lag tu gtad do// yongs su gtad
228a7(mdo sde): do// rjes su btad do// gzhag go/ gtams so// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis blangs la gzung ngo // klag go/ kun chub bya'o// bstan par bya'o// bshad par bya'o// sems
228a8(mdo sde): can thams cad la bsgrags par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dgang la ser sna med do// 'dzin pa'i sems med do// 'jigs pa med par sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sbyin pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye
228b1(mdo sde): shes dang / rang byung gi ye shes sbyin pa'o// rigs kyi bu dgang ni sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po ste/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyang nga'i rjes su spobs shig/ ser sna med par gyis la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
228b2(mdo sde): ye shes mthong ba thabs mkhas pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'ongs shing lhags pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag la yang dag par sgrogs shig/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
228b3(mdo sde): bumo gang dag dad pa dang / sems can gang dag ma dad pa de dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang dag par gzung bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis de ltar byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lan lon
228b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkyadathub pas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
228b5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de dag dga' ba dang / mchog dga' bas khyab par gyur nas/ rjes cher bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
228b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de ga la bde logs su btud lus rab tu btud nas lus bcum ste/ mgo smad nas thal mo sbyar te// thams cad kyis sgra skad gcig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la
228b7(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par 'gyu'o// 
228b8(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung ngung ji ba der bzhugs su gsal lan gnyis lan gsum du yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshigs des sgra skad gcig tu tshigs 'di skad ces bcom ldan
229a1(mdo sde): ras thugs las chung ngurang bder bzhugs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das dza gad du de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal ba de bzhin dumatha'o// can dag shegs pa
229a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par brgya'o zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas 'jig rten gzhan dag
229a3(mdo sde): nas byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog/ sa pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad slar gshegs su gsol te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
229a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas de dag la ci bder gnas pa mdzod cig ces de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la ci bder gnas pa mdzod cig ces/ bya ba gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
229a5(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang de'i mchod rten kyang gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag go/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
229a6(mdo sde): de la yang ci bder bzhugs shig ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med/ 
229a7(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas byon te/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa rnams kyi drung dag na/ seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
229a8(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen mang dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dang / spyod pa khyad par can la sogs pas rus nas 'bon pa'i byang chub sam
229b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med dpag tu med bdag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / 'khor bzhi bde dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang // dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thugs yid ras
229b2(mdo sde): te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sde/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
229b3(mdo sde): la gdams pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang chen/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi srab/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs/ sangs rgyas
229b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi gsang ba'i gnas/ sangs rgyas thams cad da kyi byang chub kyi snying po// sangs rgyas thams cad das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad
229b5(mdo sde): sku gcig tu 'dus pa/ thabs mkhas pa chen po/ theg pa gcig tu bstan pa/ don dam pa bsgrub pa bstan pa rdzogs so// / gang na mdo sde 'di yod par
229b6(mdo sde): mi ma mur gyi dong 'bobs shing // spu gri gtams las 'dzegs nas kyang // rigs kyi bu rnams 'gro bar bya// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren tra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban d+he
229b7(mdo sde): ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'jig rten kun gyi mgon cig pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa thub pa che// yon
229b8(mdo sde): tan rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad legs par brjod// bkra shis kun gyi bkra shis pa// sdig pa thams cad rab 'jom pa// sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba po// ston pa/ 
230a1(mdo sde): la ni bdag phyag 'tshal// dkra shis thams cad sbyin pa bo// lus can kun gyi skyabs mdzad pa// kun tu bde basbyin papo// zla ba bzang la bdag phyag 'tshal// bkra shis paH
230a2(mdo sde): cad yongs su rdzogs// sems can kun la thugs rtseg// sems can kun gyi mgon po mchog/ thams cad mkhyen la bdag phyag 'tshal// rig pa thams cad legs sgrub pa// sangs rgyas thogs
230a3(mdo sde): med rtogs pa bo// gnod pa thams cad sel mdzad pa// don kun grub la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa 'gro ba'i gnyen// lnga li lnga la bstod pa yi// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di/ 
230a4(mdo sde): mchog tu dge ba bdag gis bshad// don kun grub pa rdzogs sa dngas rgyas// shAkya'i skyes mchog thams cad mkhyen/ chos kun dbang phyug brtan pa po// drang srong chen po yon/ 
230a5(mdo sde): mtsho// dgra bcom bde gshegs de bzhin gshegs// bcom ldan 'jig rten kun mkhyen pa// nyes pa'i/ dri ma kun las 'das// chos kyi snang ba mdzad pa'i mchog/ 
230a6(mdo sde): 'jig med shAkya zas gtsang sras// bu ram shing ba'i rigs dga' ba// go'u tam ste nyi ma'i rigs// thud dpal nyi ma'i rgyud bdag po// 'jig rten mgon po stobs bcur ldan// bdud dpung
